body_html:
I have the same problem with 8 K80 GPUs. I installed Pytorch 0.2 using "conda".

@soumith

ldd $(dirname $(which conda))/../lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/_C.so*
linux-vdso.so.1 => (0x00002aaaaaaab000)
